text: kavurun allāh veta dun poronduva -eya sthīra kaḷa pasuda- kaḍa karannōda ovunṭada, kavurun allāh ēkarāśī kara tabana lesaṭa aṇa karana læbū dæya venkara damannōda ovunṭada, kavurun bhūmiyehi aparādha karamin særi sarannōda ovunṭada, (deviyangē) śāpayama at vanu æta. tavada ovunṭa itāmat napuru nivesada (piḷiyela kara) ættēya
